messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

On Mon, Jun 4, 2012 at 6:35 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> net/http/httputil: fix typo in comment.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6272050/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6272050/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/net/http/httputil/**dump.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/net/http/httputil/**dump.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/**dump.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/net/http/httputil/**dump.go
> @@ -75,7 +75,7 @@
>
>        // Use the actual Transport code to record what we would send
>        // on the wire, but not using TCP.  Use a Transport with a
> -       // customer dialer that returns a fake net.Conn that waits
> +       // custom dialer that returns a fake net.Conn that waits
>        // for the full input (and recording it), and then responds
>        // with a dummy response.
>        var buf bytes.Buffer // records the output
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d808b44d573f ***

net/http/httputil: fix typo in comment.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6272050

subject: code review 6272050: net/http/httputil: fix typo in comment.
